COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

FLAVOUR_0_ADTEXT.message: WANTED: Removal of {target} from the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG.message: I am most displeased to find that {target} is still alive. Needless to say you will receive no payment.

FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG2.message: {target}'s removal was not done by you. No payment this time.

FLAVOUR_0_INTROTEXT.message: Hi, I'm {name}. I'll pay you {cash} to get rid of {target}.

FLAVOUR_0_SUCCESSMSG.message: News of {target}'s long vacation gratefully received. Well done, I have initiated your full payment.

FLAVOUR_1_ADTEXT.message: WANTED: Someone to kill {target} from the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_1_FAILUREMSG.message: I hear that {target} is in good health. This pains me.

FLAVOUR_1_FAILUREMSG2.message: {target}'s demise was not caused by you, so do not ask for payment.

FLAVOUR_1_INTROTEXT.message: I need {target} taken out of the picture. I'll pay you {cash} to do this.

FLAVOUR_1_SUCCESSMSG.message: I am most sad to hear of {target}'s demise. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_2_ADTEXT.message: REMOVAL: {target} is no longer wanted in the {system} system.

FLAVOUR_2_FAILUREMSG.message: It is most regrettable that {target} is still live and well. You will receive no payment as you did not complete your contract.

FLAVOUR_2_FAILUREMSG2.message: Contract was completed by someone else. Be faster next time!

FLAVOUR_2_INTROTEXT.message: I am {name}, and I will pay you {cash} to terminate {target}.

FLAVOUR_2_SUCCESSMSG.message: You have been paid in full for the completion of that important contract.

FLAVOUR_3_FAILUREMSG.message: You will pay for not eliminating {target}!

FLAVOUR_3_FAILUREMSG2.message: Are you asking money for job done by someone else? Get lost.

FLAVOUR_3_INTROTEXT.message: The {target} must be reduced to space dust. I'll award you {cash} to do this.

FLAVOUR_3_SUCCESSMSG.message: {target} is dead. Here is your award.

FLAVOUR_4_FAILUREMSG.message: {target} is still breathing and I'm not giving money to you.

FLAVOUR_4_FAILUREMSG2.message: Retirement of {target} was done by someone else.

FLAVOUR_4_INTROTEXT.message: For {cash} we wish to encourage {target} to stop work permanently.

FLAVOUR_4_SUCCESSMSG.message: News of {target}'s retirement delightfully obtained. Here is your money.

FLAVOUR_5_FAILUREMSG.message: We found out that {target} is nonetheless operative. This saddens us.

FLAVOUR_5_INTROTEXT.message: We wish {target} to have a fitting career end in the {system} system for {cash}.

FLAVOUR_5_SUCCESSMSG.message: Message of {target}'s ending career happily acquired. Here is your {cash}.

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DONE.message: How soon must it be done?

IT_MUST_BE_DONE_AFTER.message: It must be done after {target} leaves {spaceport}. Do not miss this opportunity.

RETURN_HERE_ON_THE_COMPLETION_OF_THE_CON.message: Return here on the completion of the contract and you will be paid.

TARGET_WILL_BE_LEAVING_SPACEPORT_AT.message: Target will be leaving spaceport at:

X_WILL_BE_LEAVING.message: {target} will be leaving {spaceport} in the {system} system ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}), distance {dist} ly, at {date}. The ship is {shipname} and has registration id {shipregid}.

DENY_0.message: I'm sorry, but I don't trust you.

DENY_1.message: Come back when you have some qualifications.

DENY_2.message: I don't think you're the one I'm looking for.

DENY_3.message: You don't look like someone capable of doing what needs to be done.

DENY_4.message: You are clearly not the one for this job.

DENY_5.message: You seem much too inexperienced to handle a contract of this importance.

DENY_6.message: I have never heard of you. I need someone experienced for this contract.

DENY_7.message: I'm not willing to risk this contract by giving it to someone as inexperienced as you.
